Text: Very Nice representation of a topic that is much needed to be discussed. Since Talibani and Deobandi BHADWO, Randi ke bachho ne Islam ki bhaut hi negative picture present ki hai dunya walo ke samne so we can say that it will surely negate their perception and public will not consider every muslim is a terrorist. Talibani  MadarChodo ne to sab problem ki ek hi solution nikali hai k suside bomber bhej ke samne wale ki gand mar di jay par un chootiyu ko kaun samjhajega k jo log marte hain unke ghar walo par kiya bit ti hai.

after seeing the scenario twice what can I say but to thanks from my heart to amanrulz brother for sharing such a nice movie. Highly recommended for those who consider Islam propagates terrorism not peace between different sects of humanity.
